author: Stabant_
comment: They mainly focus on any 'extracurriculars' that are relevant to your field. I would recommend getting a list of them ready so you don't get lost or forget anything important mid interview.

```json
  "suggestions": ["get a list of extracurriculars ready for interviews"]
}
```

author: W4773N
comment: Other than that, they can still ask you questions that you won’t expect, let’s just say what advice would you give to your juniors. It’s more of like for them to see how you would respond to the questions they ask rather than the answer, so a tip wld be to be yourself.
